subject: Basketball
Jews and Judaism
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Jon Scheyer, whose dream of playing in the N.B.A. was delayed by an eye injury, joined the Maccabi Tel Aviv team under Israeli citizenship granted when he, a Jew, immigrated.
snippet: Jon Scheyer, whose dream of playing in the N.B.A. was delayed by an eye injury, joined the Maccabi Tel Aviv team under Israeli citizenship granted when he, a Jew, immigrated.
